name: Name Scrambler
description:
Name Scrambler helps you to streamline your workflow from Figma to Principle. Principle app animates layers with the same name between 2 or more frames. Name redundancy is inevitable with design systems so I made this plugin that adds a unique ID for every layer. If you want to keep the name just put _ in front of the layer name â€” that means you want to animate them.


VIDEO TUTORIAL

https://youtu.be/WVBD2_NjZEM
